summary: Michael'd have a great job, still have his 4 best friends, and be in love with a beautiful girl at 30. He loves Jenna but his life seems predictable until he meets a college girl. It seems that everybody's having relationship problems.
cast: Zach Braff|Jacinda Barrett|Casey Affleck|Rachel Bilson|Michael Weston|Eric Christian Olsen|Marley Shelton|Lauren Lee Smith|Harold Ramis|Blythe Danner|Tom Wilkinson|David Haydn-Jones|Cindy Sampson|Lisa Hochstein|Patricia Stasiak|Mark Walker|Erika Rosenbaum|Alexis Legault|Olivier Legault|Simon Alain|Ian Finlay|Barry Julien|Alexandra Ruddy|Mariah Inger|Monique Phillips|Danny Blanco Hall|Andrew Shaver|Danny Wells|Goûchy Boy|Bill Corday|Chuck Gerena|Jennifer Kreuser|Danette Mackay
title: El último beso
